The Lumidouce Case collects nearby Scents. The Lumidouce Case will level up after gathering 2 of them, after which it will fire 1 extra Puff of Puredew when firing, while the DMG dealt by and DMG AoE of the above attack will also be increased.</li><li>1 Lumidouce Case created by Emilie herself can exist at any one time. The Case starts at Level 1 and can go up to Level 2. If the Case does not collect any Scents for 8s while it is on the field, it will go back to Level 1.</li></ul><br>'''Arkhe: Pneuma'''<br>At intervals, after Emilie creates a Lumidouce Case this way, a Spiritbreath Thorn will descend in front of her and pierce her opponent, dealing {{Pneuma}}-aligned {{Color|Dendro DMG}}.

{{Description|"The world is an endless harmony of fragrance, color, and song."}}
'''Fragrance Extraction''' is [[Emilie]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Level 1/2 Lumidouce Case Attack DMG|1}}
** This particle generation can only trigger once per '''2.5''' seconds.
* {{Talent Note|no snapshot|Lumidouce Case Attack DMG|character=Emilie}}
* Level 1/2 Lumidouce Case attacks once every '''1.5''' seconds.
